Articles.Content:
Hello

I have a problem with transfering fuel. I have done the things have to do in the settings area, and I am able to transfer fuel with other crafts. Just this one won't work, I have also tried to attach and then reeatach.

https://ibb.co/hsvjSfr

Any ideas or past experiences ?

Edited July 17, 2022 by Mirek

at some difficulty levels, you can't transfer fuel through a claw.

besides that, I had fuel transfer bugs, but redocking in a different spot actually helped. also, sometimes fuel transfer is very slow, so maybe it takes several seconds to see the fuel level change.

so, if it's none of the usual culprits (fuel transfer through claw not allowed, buildings to updrade, lack of control) I have no idea.
I think I saw a while ago that some fuel transfer bugs were fixed by mousing over the checkboxes next to the amounts in the resource panel.
